about_the_game:
Revolver roulette is a game that tests players' courage and luck. In the game, a revolver will be used to simulate the scene of Russian roulette. Players need to load bullets, use items to increase their chances of winning, and finally shoot to defeat the opponent and receive their prize money.
1. Bullet loading system: Players can decide the bullet status of the six bullet nests inside the revolver, enriching the complexity of the game. 2. Prop usage: The game provides various props, such as apples, cola, bananas, etc. Players can cleverly use these props to increase their winning rate or interfere with opponents.
3. Store system: Players can use their existing funds to purchase corresponding items during game battles and improve their advantages.
4. Real time battle mode: Players can use the local area network to engage in real-time battles with other players, experiencing intense and exciting competitive fun.
5. Endless Mode: Players can continuously challenge their limits in Endless Mode, reflecting the charm of thinking.
